JETTON-TRACKING-1.name: Jetton Anomaly Transactions
JETTON-TRACKING-1.description: This bot detects all transactions of traded Jettons if transaction amount more than 3% of daily volume or more than 1k TON
JETTON-TRACKING-1.author: shuva10v

DEX-SWAP-2.name: DEXes Swaps Tracking
DEX-SWAP-2.description: This bot detects all swaps on all DEXes (buy, sell, swap).
DEX-SWAP-2.author: maksymds

DEX-THREATS.name: DEX Threats Detection
DEX-THREATS.description: Monitors blockchain transactions for specified events emitted from specified contract addresses. E.g. throw alerts when the two sides of the bridge are unexpectedly are out of balance.
DEX-THREATS.author: maksymds

JETTON-MONITOR-1.name: Jetton Activity Monitor
JETTON-MONITOR-1.description: This bot detects mint, burn and other changes in Jetton Master. Live tracking, alerts, notifications.
JETTON-MONITOR-1.author: maksymds

BRIDGE-THREATS.name: Bridge Threats Detection
BRIDGE-THREATS.description: Monitors blockchain transactions for specified events emitted from specified contract addresses. E.g. throw alerts when the two sides of the bridge are unexpectedly are out of balance.
BRIDGE-THREATS.author: maksymds

SCAM-DETECTOR-1.name: Scam Detector Feed
SCAM-DETECTOR-1.description: The Scam Detector bot combines past alerts under a common address from a variety of underlying base bots to emit a high precision alert. It does so by mapping each alert to the four attack stages utilizing a heuristic detection approach.
SCAM-DETECTOR-1.author: maksymds

SCAM-MESSAGES-1.name: Scam Messages Bot
SCAM-MESSAGES-1.description: This bot analyzes sentiment and emotion of transaction text message sent between addresses. Fired when a transaction contains a negative text message.
SCAM-MESSAGES-1.author: shuva10v

LARGE-TRANSFER-OUT.name: Large Transfer Out Bot
LARGE-TRANSFER-OUT.description: This bot detects transactions with large TON native transfers (>50k TON). By itself, this bot will be quite noisy.
LARGE-TRANSFER-OUT.author: shuva10v

GOVERNANCE-THREATS.name: Governance Threats Detection
GOVERNANCE-THREATS.description: Monitors blockchain transactions for specified events emitted from specified contract addresses. E.g. Identifies when the voting power changes signficantly.
GOVERNANCE-THREATS.author: maksymds

NFT-SALES-1.name: NFT Sales Bot
NFT-SALES-1.description: This bot detects NFT Sales and throw additional alert for Fragment sales. By  itself, this bot  will be quite noisy.
NFT-SALES-1.author: maksymds

NFT-THREATS.name: NFT Threats Detection
NFT-THREATS.description: Monitors blockchain transactions for specified events emitted from specified contract addresses. E.g. Alerts when an NFT is created in a way that appears to be minted from another account or alerts on evidence of wash trading
NFT-THREATS.author: maksymds

JETTON-MARKET-1.name: Jetton Price Alerts
JETTON-MARKET-1.description: Jettons Market Data Feed: TVL overview, charts, prices, volumes. Real-time notifications and alerts.
JETTON-MARKET-1.author: maksymds

ATTACK-DETECTOR.name: Attack Detector Feed
ATTACK-DETECTOR.description: The Attack Detector bot combines past alerts under a common address from a variety of underlying base bots to emit a high precision alert. It does so by mapping each alert to the four attack stages utilizing an anomaly as well as heuristic detection approach.
ATTACK-DETECTOR.author: maksymds

CEX-FUNDING.name: CEX Funding Bot
CEX-FUNDING.description: This bot detects transactions with large TON native transfers in/out CEXes (>25k TON).
CEX-FUNDING.author: maksymds

DEFI-THREATS.name: DeFI Threats Detection
DEFI-THREATS.description: Monitors blockchain transactions for specified events emitted from specified contract addresses. E.g. Identifies when the balance of an account decreases significantly or throw alerts on anomalous transaction volume (both successful and failed).
DEFI-THREATS.author: shuva10v

JETTON-MARKET-2.name: Jetton Price Alerts
JETTON-MARKET-2.description: Jettons possible arbitrage deals for all platfroms (CEXes and DEXes). Real-timenotifications and alerts.
JETTON-MARKET-2.author: shuva10v

DEX-SWAP-1.name: DeDust Swaps Tracking
DEX-SWAP-1.description: This bot detects all swaps on DeDust DEX (buy, sell, swap).
DEX-SWAP-1.author: shuva10v
